item.title: ZZZ: A Gacha Masterpiece
item.description: The newest game release from miHoYo has proven to be the bane of my productivity, but in a good way. It has been a lengthy time since I have been as invested into a video game as I am into Zenless Zone Zero. This ‘urban fantasy ARPG’ is reminiscent of the Persona games, minus the turn-based combat sequences. I have enjoyed Persona 3 before on my old PlayStation Portable, but I have never been an avid fan of the games.

item.title: Projects
item.description: This page is a comprehensive showcase of projects I have had the privilege to work on throughout my professional journey. Each project showcased here has been handpicked and represents a unique challenge and an opportunity to unleash my creativity, problem-solving skills, and passion for innovation. Table of Contents Gun Samurai (Prototype) - Class-based Shooter Overview Prototype Gun Samurai (Prototype) - Class-based Shooter Link to heading A class-based competitive first-person shooter created with Unreal Engine 5.
